name: Lenovo ThinkBook 15 G2 ITL 20VE0117MH
description: With the 15-inch Lenovo ThinkBook 15 G2 ITL 20VE0117MH, you can keep your email up to date, write out texts, and edit content in management systems. With the Intel Core i5 processor and 8GB RAM, you can edit professional photos with Adobe Photoshop. Your files are properly protected with Windows 11 Pro. The chance that other people can access your documents is small. This chance gets even smaller when you use the fingerprint scanner. Ambient light won't have a negative impact on your work. You can comfortably continue to work in the dark thanks to the backlit keyboard. And when there's a lot of sunlight, you won't be bothered by reflections on the screen.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad 5 14IAL7 82SD00B8MH
description: Edit large photo and video files, and multitask with demanding programs on the 14-inch Lenovo IdeaPad 5 14IAL7 82SD00B8MH. Thanks to the 12th generation Intel Core i7 processor and 16GB DDR4 RAM, you can do all of this at the same time and without slowing down. Done with your work? Render your images quickly with the Intel Iris Xe Graphics shared video card. You can take this powerful Lenovo anywhere thanks to its compact size and light 1.4kg weight. That way, you can even work on your creative projects on the go. The aluminum casing is strong, so you won't have to worry about a damaged laptop if it gets hit. This laptop has also passed military-grade testing, so spilling a drink on it doesn't cause any problems.

name: Asus X515EA-EJ3288W

Thanks to the anti-glare screen, you won't be bothered by reflections, light, and greasy fingerprints as much, so you can also continue to work in the sun.

name: HP ProBook 440 G9 - 6F219EA
description: The HP ProBook 440 G9 - 6F219EA is a 14-inch business laptop that's powerful enough for on the go and photo editing. With this ProBook, you don't have to worry about your privacy. You can also remotely access systems at the office and better secure your files with Windows Pro 10. Securely log in with the infrared camera, which you can easily cover with the webcam slider. You can edit photos in programs like Photoshop with the future-proof 12th generation Intel Core i5 processor and 16GB RAM. Your photos also render smoothly thanks to the Intel Iris Xe Graphics shared video card. Thanks to its compact size and light weight of only 1.38kg, you can easily take the laptop with you. Did you accidentally spill something on your keyboard? No worries, the laptop is spill-resistant. In addition, the low halogen level of the laptop material makes this ProBook a sustainable choice.
